1   package org.kohsuke.args4j.spi;
2   import java.util.List;
3   
4   import org.kohsuke.args4j.CmdLineException;
5   import org.openimaj.util.pair.IndependentPair;
6   
7   /**
8    * Abstraction of the value setter.
9    *
10   * @author Kohsuke Kawaguchi
11   * @param <T> the type returned
12   */
13  public interface Getter<T> {
14      /**
15       * A {@link Getter} object has an implicit knowledge about the property it's setting,
16       * and the instance of the option bean.
17       * 
18       * @return Get all values to the property of the option bean.
19       * @throws CmdLineException 
20       */
21      List<IndependentPair<String, Class<?>>> getStringValues() throws CmdLineException;
22  
23      /**
24       * @return Gets the type of the underlying method/field.
25       */
26      Class<?> getType();
27      
28      /**
29       * @return Whether this setter is instrinsically multi-valued.
30       */
31      boolean isMultiValued();
32      
33      /**
34       * @return The option name
35       */
36      public String getOptionName();
37  }
